name: Matcha Latte
preparation:
1. In a cup or mug, whisk mix with boiling water until dissolved.  
  2. Top with frothed milk, if desired.
tips: Try it iced! Whisk 1 – 1 1⁄2 tbsp mix into 1⁄2 cup boiling water to dissolve. Add 1⁄2 cup your choice cold milk, non-dairy milk, or water and pour over ice. Serve blended, if desired.
